cities.name: Sydney, Australia
cities.description: A vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge.

cities.name: Melbourne, Australia
cities.description: A cultural hub famous for its art, food, and diverse neighborhoods.

cities.name: Tokyo, Japan
cities.description: A bustling metropolis blending tradition and modernity, famous for its cherry blossoms and rich culture.

cities.name: Kyoto, Japan
cities.description: Known for its historic temples, gardens, and traditional tea houses.

cities.name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
cities.description: A lively city known for its stunning beaches, vibrant carnival celebrations, and iconic landmarks.

cities.name: São Paulo, Brazil
cities.description: The financial hub with diverse culture, arts, and a vibrant nightlife.

cities.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
cities.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site and the largest religious monument in the world.

cities.name: Taj Mahal, India
cities.description: An iconic symbol of love and a masterpiece of Mughal architecture.

cities.name: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
cities.description: An island known for its stunning turquoise waters and luxurious overwater bungalows.

cities.name: Copacabana Beach, Brazil
cities.description: This scenic African island, which sits east of Madagascar, offers a multitude of beaches worth prioritizing.

cities.name: Maldives, India
cities.description: This Indian Ocean paradise is made up of approximately 1,200 islands – and each beach is more beautiful than the last.

cities.name: Whitsunday Islands, Australia
cities.description: Located off the northeastern coast of Australia, the Whitsunday Islands feel like an entirely different world
